[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:paperstack]]

[[module css]]
:root {
  --header-title: "";
  --header-subtitle: "";
  --top-layer-color: #bc392b;
  --paper-faded-color: #d9d9d9;
  --sp_rate-module-background: #ca8787;
}

#top-bar div.open-menu a {
	background: #8e0000;
}

#login-status, #login-status a {
	color: white;
}

div.page-rate-widget-box, div.rate-box-with-credit-button {
	background-color: #8e0000;
}

#search-top-box-input, #search-top-box-input:hover, #search-top-box-input:focus, #search-top-box-form input[type="submit"], #search-top-box-form input[type="submit"]:hover, #search-top-box-form input[type="submit"]:focus {
  background: #8e0000;
}

#main-content div.page-rate-widget-box span:is(.rate-points, .btn) {
	color: white;
}

.page-rate-widget-box :is(.rateup, .ratedown) a {
	color: white;
}

div.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a {
	color: white;
}

[[/module]]
